Core Flight Executive Documentation

cFE Time Services Configuration Parameters

The following are configuration parameters used to configure the cFE Time Services either for each platform or for a mission as a whole.

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_LATCH_FLY
Define Periodic Time to Update Local Clock Tone Latch

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_SERVER
Time Server or Time Client Selection

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_SIGNAL
Include or Exclude the Primary/Redundant Tone Selection Cmd

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_SOURCE
Include or Exclude the Internal/External Time Source Selection Cmd

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_SRC_MET
Choose the External Time Source for Server only

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_START_FLY
Define Time to Start Flywheel Since Last Tone

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_TONE_LIMIT
Define Timing Limits From One Tone To The Next

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_VIRTUAL
Local MET or Virtual MET Selection for Time Servers

Global CFE_TIME_ENA_1HZ_CMD_PKT
Enable (or disable) the 1HZ time command packet

Global CFE_TIME_MAX_DELTA_SECS
Define the Max Delta Limits for Time Servers using an Ext Time Source

Global CFE_TIME_MAX_LOCAL_SECS
Define the Local Clock Rollover Value in seconds and subseconds

Global CFE_TIME_MAX_NUM_SYNCH_FUNCS
Define Maximum number of Time Synchronization Callbacks allowed

Global CFE_TIME_START_TASK_PRIORITY
Define TIME Task Priorities

Global CFE_TIME_START_TASK_STACK_SIZE
Define TIME Task Stack Sizes

Global CFE_TIME_AT_TONE_WAS
Default Time and Tone Order

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_DEFAULT_TAI
Default Time Format

Global CFE_TIME_CFG_FAKE_TONE
Default Time Format

Global CFE_TIME_DEF_MET_SECS
Default Time Values

Global CFE_TIME_EPOCH_YEAR
Default EPOCH Values

Global CFE_TIME_FS_FACTOR
Time File System Factor

Global CFE_TIME_MIN_ELAPSED
Min and Max Time Elapsed

Generated on Mon Jun 29 12:31:32 2015 for Core Flight Executive on by  1.4.7
